name: Harry Gathers Wood
description:
This game was made for http://onehourgamejam.com/?page=jam&jam=134

The theme was "Forest". The goal is to avoid the logs and vines while collecting firewood. The game is infinite.

WARNING: The music might be loud, I didn't mess with the levels so get ready to turn down the sound.

Controls: [UP] or [SPACE] to jump.          [DOWN], [SHIFT] or [CONTROL] to crouch.
